headline: Is ServiceNow (NOW) Turning Biometric Security Into Its Next AI Workflow Moat?
summary: In January 2026, authID announced an integration with ServiceNow to bring secure biometric identity verification into more than 8,400 ServiceNow-powered contact centers, including a large majority of Fortune 500 users, with audit-ready logs embedded directly in the platform. This move deepens ServiceNow’s role at the heart of mission-critical workflows by tying its AI and automation capabilities more tightly to fraud prevention and high-risk transaction security.
